flawed_nl_solution:
There were 12.6 - 4.6 = <<12.6-4.6=9>>9 gigabytes used after deleting some files.
Then, the used space went up to 9 + 2 = <<9+2=11>>11 gigabytes after storing other files.
Thus, the new 20 gigabytes external drive will have 20 - 11 = <<20-11=9>>9 gigabytes free.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
